awd_titl_txt: The Nature and Evolution of Radio Sources in Clusters       of Galaxies
awd_abstract_narration: This project represents a collaboration between a leading                       theorist and a well-respected observer to attack in a detailed                  manner the questions of the nature and evolution of radio sources               in clusters of galaxies.  An extensive data base of some 300                    cluster radio sources will be prepared, and theoretical modeling                of the evolution of these sources will be tested against that                   data.  Radio, infrared, and optical data will be utilized, and                  various extensions of the standard model for these sources will                 be tested, as well as alternative evolutionary models.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
